## Block.appendInput\_() method

Add a value input, statement input or local variable to this block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected appendInput_(type: number, name: string): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | number | One of Blockly.inputTypes. |
|  name | string | Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this input again. Should be unique to this block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Input

The input object created.
